text:p.text:span: Ruka
Amang'ana amajomu ga Yesu kyego gang'orwa na
RUKA
Obhukangati
1 Omukuru Teofiro, amang'ana garya gakoreka gati yetu, abhantu bhaaru bhakoreri ekitunyo kya okugang'ora.
2 Bhaang'ora amang'ana kya garya twakeeribhwa na bhanu bherorera amang'ana gayo kwa ameeso gabho, kurwa ku-bhwambiro bhwa emirimu gya Yesu. Bhayo mbo bharinga bharanyaragan'ya ering'ana rya Waryubha.
3 Oni nonse nekomerye bhwahene kyego gakoreka kurwa ku-bhwambiro. Nkarora m-bujomu nkung'orere naho,
4 uuwe wonse obhe na obhuhene bhwa amang'ana ganu wehigiribhwa.
Obhurooti bhwa Okwibhurwa kwa Yoana Omubhatija

5 Eribhaga rinu Herode yaringa omukama wa Yudea, yaringa-ho omusyengeri umwi erina ryaye Zakaria wa omuganda gwa omusyengeri Abhia. Mkaye wonse, yaringa wa oruganda ruyo rwa omusyengeri Harooni eriina ryaye yabhirikirwanga Jabheti.
6 Bhabhiri bhayo bharinga na egintungwa embere ya Omukama Waryubha. Bhakagwata emigiro gyaye gyonsego, bhegwanga na amaragiriryo gaye bira masoro.
7 Bhabhiri bhayo bharinga bhatebhwiri, kwa bhurya omukari yaringa mugumba, na bhaaringa bhariri omunyu mwaaru.
8 Rusiku rumwi, rwaringa orwiru rwa omuganda gwa Zakaria okukora emirimu mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha.
9 Kuriing'aana na ekimiira kya obhusyengeri Zakaria akachwagurwa okusoha mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha amutuutire-mo ekurusu.
10 Zakaria hanu yasoha okutuuta ekurusu, abhantu bhaaru bharinga bhekekuman'ye kibhara, bharasabha Waryubha.
11 Rumwiigo, Zakaria akarwiirwa na maraika wa Waryubha, "uuu". Maraika uyo akemirira orubhaara rwa okuryo rwa emeja ya okututira ekurusu.
12 Zakaria hanu yamurora aketakya, "eee". Akoobhoha bhukong'u!
13 Naho maraika uyo akamukeerya, "Uuwe Zakaria tiga kobhoha! Ganu wasabhanga Waryubha, yagegwiri. Mkaaho Jabheti arikwiibhurira omwana wa ekisaaja, orimutoga Yoana.
14 Omwana uyo ng'o arikora mubhe na obhujomerwa bhukong'u na abhantu bhaaru bharijomererwa okwibhurwa kwaye.
15 Aribha mkuru embere ya Omukama. Atarija kunywa amarwa gogonse garya. Ariijuribhwa Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha hata akyari munda ya ng'ina wabho.
16 Arihiindya abhantu bhaaru bha Israeri ku Omukama Waryubha wabho.

17 Arimukangatira Kristo, aseemye abhantu bharija kumuturung'ana, aryorokereribhwa na omutima na eginguru kya egya Eriya. Aribhagwatan'ya abhana na bhesewabho, na bhanu bhatana egintungwa ku Waryubha, aribhakora bhabhe nagyo bhwahene."
18 Zakaria akamubhuurya, "Ndegwa oni na mukani turingi bhagotu, eribha egaki twibhure omwana?"
19 Maraika akagamba ega, "Noni Gaburieri, unu ndemiirira embere ya Waryubha. Yantumiri enu oringi, nije kukukeerya amang'ana amajomu gayo.
20 Kwa okubha otakwikirirya amang'ana gani, kwambira bhoono orabha emumu na otakutura kuhaira mpaka kuhikya kwa eribhaga rinu ganu garikoreka. Na garikoreka kwibhaga ryaye."
21 Abhantu bhanu bhaaringa bharaganyirira Zakaria ahuruke kibhara, bhakaruguura kwa okurora kyego yatigita muyo.
22 Yaja kurwa-mo, atanagya kweki kugamba nabho, akamba kubhorokya na mabhoko. Rumwiigo, bhakamanya aruji obhuroti mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha. Wonse akagendererya kubha emumu.
23 Na eribhaga yaringa amariri ginsiku gyaye gya okukora emirimu mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha akagya ika.
24 Ebhagarindi, mkaye Jabheti akagega enda. Akamara mieri etanu yebhisiri, akagamba ega,
25 "Omukama ng'o yankoreriigo! Nonse yang'itukiri, yandusirye ginsoni ku-bhantu".
Obhuroti bhwa Okwibhurwa kwa Yesu
26 Enda iyo hanu yahikya mieri esansabha, Waryubha akatuma maraika Gaburieri ku-mugi gwa Nazareti mu-kyaro kya Gariraya.
27 Ahike ku muhara umwi, eriina ryaye Mariamu. Unu yaringa arombeerwe obhuko na musaja umwi, erina ryaye Yusufu, wa oruganda rwa omukama Daudi.
28 Maraika uyo, akagya wa Mariamu akamukeerya, "Ndakukeran'ya wenonkwe bhukong'u! Omukama Waryubha ari hamwi na uuwe".
29 Mariamu hanu yegwa amang'ana ga maraika uyo, enkoro yaye eketanduka bhukong'u akebhuurya, "Nkeran'ya ki inu?"
30 Naho maraika uyo akamukeerya, "Uuwe Mariamu tigakobhoha, wanonkwa ku Waryubha.
31 Bhoono oragega enda, wibhure omwana wa ekisaaja omutoge Yesu.
32 Aribha mukuru, aribhirikirwa mwana wa Waryubha unu aringi eguru yabhyonsego. Omukama Waryubha arimirirya kweki na arimuhana obhutungi bhwa omukama Daudi jaji wabho.
33 Na aribha Omukama wa abhantu bhonsego bha Israeri nsiku gyonsego, obhukama bhwaye, bhutarihwa kweki."
34 Mariamu akamubhuurya maraika ega, "Ganu garibha egaki enu oni ntamanyiri musaja?"

35 Akakyukya "Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gurikujira, na obhuturo bhwa Waryubha, unu ariguru ya gonsego bhurikukundikirya. Kwego, omwana unu oriibhura aribha mwahurwa na aribhirikirwa mwana wa Waryubha.
36 Na omuhiiri waho Jabheti unu bhabhirikiranga mugumba, mu-bhugotu bhwaye bhuyo, ya gegeri enda na omweri gunu ngwa kasansabha.
37 Yagegeri enda kwa okubha ku Waryubha, ritariho rinu ritakuturika."
38 Mariamu akakyukya, "Ndi mukoriwamirimu wa Omukama, ebhe kuoni kyego ogambiri". Rumwiigo, "uuu", maraika uyo akagya.
Mariamu Aragya Kukeeran'ya Jabheti
39 Kuginsiku giyogiyo, Mariamu akasemya orugendo akagya wa Jabheti, ku-mugi gumwi gwa kuginkuku gya Yudea.
40 Hanu yasoha mu-nyumba ya Zakaria, akakeran'ya Jabheti.
41 Jabheti hanu yegwa enkeran'ya ya Mariamu, omwana unu yaringa munda yaye akahooya. Hayohayo, Jabheti akejuribhwa na Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha.
42 Akagamba rumwiigo kwa erisi enene,"Ku-bhakari bhonsego uuwe nuwe wanonkwa! Na omwana unu oriibhura, wonse yanonkwa.
43 Oni niwi, hata mayi wa Omukama wetu ujiri kunkeran'ya?
44 Kyego nigwiri enkeran'ya yaho, hayohayo omwana unu aringi munda yani rumwiigo yahooya kwa okujomerwa.
45 Uuwe wanonkwa kwa bhurya wikiriirye ega, ganu Omukama yakukeerya garikoreka!"
Eriimbo rya Mariamu
46 Mariamu akagamba ega,
"Enkoro yani eramukumya Omukama,
47 eriho erajomererwa Waryubha, unu yantuurya.
48 Kwa okubha, yang'iitukiri oni,
omukori wemirimu waye,
hata mbhe muntu wa insi.
Kurwa bhoono, abhantu bha nganda na nganda bharibha bharagamba ega,
oni ng'weriruguto.
49 Waryubha wa obhuturo yankoreeri ekika,
na eriina ryaye nirabhu.
50 Aragendererya kuseren'ya abhantu bha eginganda na eginganda bhanu bharamwigwa.
51 Akoreri amang'ana amakuru kwa eginguru gyaye,
yanyaragan'ya abhekisirani.
52 Akabheetuumya abhakuru ku-bhitumbi bhyabho bhya obhutungi,
abhanyohu akabheemukya.
53 Abhomweko akabheegutya bhujomu,
naho abhaami akabhaken'ya mabhoko masa.
54 Akabhasakirya Abhaisraeri abhakori bhaye bha emirimu,
kwa okuhiituka okubhaseren'ya.
55 Yakora gayo kyego yaringa arageni na Ibrahimu na bhajaji bhetu,
hata ku-bhantu bhonsego bha oruganda rwaye nsiku gyonsego."
56 Mariamu akekara owa Jabheti mieri esatu, akamara akahinda owaye.
Okwibhurwa kwa Yoana Omubhatija
57 Orusiku rwa okwibhura kwa Jabheti rukaahika, akeebhura omwana wa ekisaaja.
58 Abhaahang'i waye na bhahiiri bhaye, hanu bhegwa kyego Omukama yamukorera ekika, bhakajomerwa hamwi nawe.
59 Omwana uyo hanu yahikya orusiku rwa munane, bhakaaja kumusaara. Bhakenda bhamuhane eriina rya esewabho, Zakaria.
60 Hatego ng'ina wabho akanga, akagamba, "Abhirikirwe Yoana".
61 Bhakakyukya, "Ndegwa atariho muhiiri wenyu, unu arabhirikirwa eriina riyo?"
62 Bhakabhuurya esewabho kwa okumworokya na mabhoko, naho abhakeerye eriina rinu arenda kutoga omwana waye.
63 Akabhasabha ekibhaau akakyandika ega, "Eriina ryaye ng'o Yoana." Bhonsego bhakaruguura.
64 Rumwiigo, omunwa na orurimi rwaye bhikasikurirwa akamba okuhaira kweki, akamukumya Waryubha.
65 Abhaahang'i bhonsego bhakaruguura bhukong'u. Eng'ana iyo ekamanyikana bhukong'u ku-migi gyoonsego ginu giringi ku-ginkuku gya Yudea.
66 Bhonsego bhanu bhegwa, bhakabha bharebhuurya, "omwana uyo aribha muntu wa egaki?" Bhaagamba ego kwa okubha heene Waryubha yaringa hamwi nawe.
Eriimbo rya Zakaria
67 Zakaria esewabho omwana uyo, akejuribhwa Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha. Akarusya obhuuroti ega,
68 "Omukama Waryubha wetu wa Israeri akumibhwe!
Kwa okubha yajiri kututurya bhetu abhantu bhaye.
69 Atuheeri omutuurya owa eginguru kurwa kuruganda rwa omkori waye wemirimu Daudi,
70 kyego bhurya yaringa amariri kugamba akare hayo kwa enjira ya abharoti bhaye bha mitima emirabhu.
71 Yatukeerya ega, akatutuurirye kurwa ku-bhasigu bhetu
na mu-mabhoko ga bhanu bhara tubhihirirwa.
72 Akagamba ega, alihituka emuma yaye endabhu inu yarya na bhajaji bhetu,
na aribhaseren'ya.
73 Emuma iyo ng'yo yarya na jaji wetu Ibrahimu.
74 Atutuurirye kurwa mu-mabhoko ga abhasigu bhetu,
naho tubhe turamusabha bira bhobha.
75 Naho tubhe abharabhu na abhaheene embere yaye, nsiku gwetu gyonseego.
76 Uuwe mwanawani, oribha orabhirikirwa muroti wa Waryubha,
unu ariguru ya bhyonsego.
Na orimukangatira Omukama, anyore omuseemerye enjira.
77 Orikeerya abhantu bhaye ega, bharituuribhwa
kwa okwabhirwa obhusarya bhwabho,
78 kwa enjira ya enonkwe ya Waryubha wetu.
Obhutuurya bhuyo bhuritujira kurwa murwire kya endingasi,
79 na bhurimirikira bhanu bhari mu-kisunte,
na munyanko ya eng'anga ya okukwa.
Bhuritorokeererya tugendenga ku-njira gya omurembe."
80 Omwana uyo, akakiina, akanyora ginguru munkoro yaye. Akagya kwikara ku-kibhara, mpaka eribhaga rinu yeyorokya ku Abhaisraeri.
Okwiibhurwa kwa Yesu
1 Ku-ginsiku giyo omukama Augusto wa Rumi, akaragirirya ega, abhantu bhoosego bhanu bharingi mu-bhyaro bhya ku-bhutungi bhwaye bhagye kung'orwa.
2 Okung'orwa kuyo kwaringa kwa-okwamba, kwakoreka eribhaga rinu Kurenio yaringa omutungi wa ekyaro kya Siria.
3 Ego, abhantu bhonsego bhakagya kira muntu mu-mugi gwa oruganda rwabho.

4 Yaringa-ho muntu umwi eriina ryaye Yusufu, wonse akarwa mu-mugi gwa Nazareti, mu-kyaro kya Gariraya, akarina kugya mu-mugi gwa Daudi, Beterehemu gunu guringi Yudea. Yagya eyo kwa okubha yaringa wa oruganda rwa Daudi.
5 Yusufu akagya okwing'ora hamwi na Mariamu, unu yaringa aromberi obhuko. Eribhaga riyo Mariaamu yaringa na enda.
6 Hanu bhahika eyo okwibhura kwaye kukahika.

7 Akebhura omwana wa ekisaaja omutangi, mu-nyumba yegintugo. Akamukundikirya emyenda gya ekyana, akamurarya mwitubha rya okurisya-mo gintugo. Yebhurira muyo kwa okubha bhatanyora omweya gwa okurara, mu-nyumba gya abhageni.
Abharisya Bhararwirwa na Maraika
8 Bharinga-ho abharisya bhararinda gintugo gyabho ku-kibhara bhutiku.
9 Rumwiigo, bhakarwirwa na maraika umwi, endingasi ya Omukama ekabhamirikira mbara gyonsego, bhakabha na enkubhi enene bhukong'u.
10 Maraika uyo akabhakeerya, "Mutige kobhoha, mbareteeri amang'ana amajomu ganu garijomera abhantu bhonsego.
11 Rero inu mu-mugi gwa Daudi, yebhwirwe omutuurya wenyu. Omutuurya uyo ng'o Kristo Omukama.
12 Ekimanyiriryo kya okorokya gayo niga, mwakanyoore omwana ekijaare araribhwe mwitubha rya okurisirya gintugo, akundikiribhwe emyenda gya ekyana."
13 Rumwiigo, bhakaja ebhiku na ebhiku bhya bha maraika kurwa murwire, bhakabha bharamukumya Waryubha ega,
14 "Waryubha wa murwire akumibhwe!
Na mu-kyaro, omurembe gubhe ku-bhantu bhanu arabhekirirya."
15 Maraika bhayo hanu bhaahinda murwire. Abharisya bhakagambana, "Tugende mu-mugi gwa Beterehemu turore ganu gatukiriyo, kyego Omukama atukererye".
16 Bhakagya bhwangu bhwangu, hanu bhaahika bhakanyoora Mariamu na Yusufu, na omwana ekijaare areri mwitubha rya okurisirya gintugo.
17 Hanu bhamara kumurora omwana uyo, bhakararika ku bhantu amang'ana gonsego ganu maraika abhakeererye eguru yaye.
18 Bhonsego bhanu bhegwa ganu bhakeeribhwa na abharisya, bhakaruguura bhukong'u.
19 Mariamu akagabhiika gayo gonsego mumoyo gwaye akabha aragetegerera.
20 Abharisya bhayo bhakahunjuka, enu bharamukumya Waryubha, kugonsego ganu bhegwa na okugarora. Kyego bhurya bhaakeribhwa na maraika, nigo gonsego gakoreka.
21 Omwana uyo, hanu yahikya orusiku rwa munane, bhakamusaara bhakamutoga Yesu. Riyo ndyo eriina rinu maraika yaringa amariri kumuhana, eribhaga ng'ina wabho yaringa akyari kugega enda.
Yesu Aratuurwa Mbere ya Waryubha
22 Yusufu na Mariamu bhamara ginsiku gya okuramwa kwabho kyego yenderwanga ku-maragiriryo ga Musa. Nho bhakahira Yesu mu-mugi gwa Yerusaremu, naho bhamuture embere ya Omukama.
23 Bhakora ego, kyego yang'orwa ku-maragiriryo ga Omukama ega, "Omwana omutangi we kisaaja, bhamwahure kubha embere ya Omukama".
24 Hamwi na gayo, bhendanga bhamurusirye ekimwenso kyego yang'orwa ku-maragiriryo ga Omukama, ega, "Bharenderwa bharusye bhiguti bhibhiri au amaana gabhiri ga ekiguti".

25 Yaringa-ho muntu umwi Yerusaremu hayo, eriina ryaye Simeoni. Yaringa muntu wa heene, mwitegereri ku Waryubha. Yaganyiriranga kurora okutuuribhwa kwa Israeri, kweki Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gwaringa hamwi nawe.
26 Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gwaringa gumukeererye ega, atarikwa akyari kurora Kiristo wa Omukama.

27 Abhebhuri bha Yesu hanu bhamuhira murubhago rwa erisyengerero rya Waryubha, bhakore kyego bhaaragiriribhwa na amaragiriryo ga Omukama. Simeoni wonse Omutima Omurabhu gwa Waryubha gukamworokeererya ega, asohe muyo.
28 Akatuura Mariamu omwana enu aramukumya Waryubha ega,
29 "Omukama, kyego wandaga oni omkori wemirimu waho,
naruji obhurage bhwaho,
bhoono okanyikiririrye nkwe na omurembe.
30 Kwa okubha niroreeri obhutuurya bhunu oreteri,
31 bhunu wa semerye naho bhutuuke ku-bhantu bhonsego.
32 Obhutuurya bhuyo ni ndingasi ya okorokya enjira yaho,
ku bhantu bhanu bhataringi abhayahudi.
Hata abhantu bhaaho bha Israeiri bhonsego bharitogonibhwa."
33 Amang'ana ganu Simeoni yagamba eguru ya omwana uyo, gakaruguurya abhebhuri bhaye.

34 Hayo Simeoni akabhanonka, akamukeerya Mariamu, ng'inawabho omwana uyo, "Omwana unu, asorerwe na Waryubha okusikya Abhaisraeri bhaaru na okutuurya abhandi bhaaru. Aribha ekimanyiriryo kya Waryubha, kinu kiryangwa na abhantu.
35 Abhantu bhayo, amang'ana ganu gebhisanga mumyoyo gyabho, garitubhuka ku-bhurabhu. Uuwe wonse oriigwa obhururu bhukong'u oribha kyaunu obhitirwe na omuhyu omoogi."

36 Yaringa-ho omuroti umwi omukungu bhukong'u, eriina ryaaye yabhirikirwanga Ana, muhara wa Fanueli, wa oruganda rwa Asheri. Yekara myaaka muhungati egyenego na musaja waye, kurwa kyego yatetwa, musaja waye akakwa.

37 Akatigara musino, akabha arasabha mu-risyengerero ya Waryubha mubhasu na bhutiku. Kwibhaga rya okusabha yenyimanga ebhyakurya. Hanu Yesu yaretwa mu-risyengerero rya Waryubha, Ana uyo yaringa ahikirye miaka mirongo munane na enna.
38 Ebhaga riyo riyo Ana akeyorokya, akaamba kumukumya Waryubha, akararika amang'ana ga omwana uyo kubhantu bhonsego bhanu bhaganyiriranga Waryubha atuurye Yerusaremu.
39 Yusufu na Mariamu, hanu bhaamara kukora gonsego ganu amaragiriryo ga Omukama gendanga, bhakahunjuka owabho mu-mugi gwa Nazareti, mu-kyaro kya Gariraya.
40 Omwana akakina, akabha na eginguru, akejuribhwa gitungwa, na yaringa aranonkwa na Waryubha.
Omwana Yesu Mu-Risyengerero rya Waryubha
41 Abheebhuri bhaye, bhariinanga kugya Yerusaremu kira mwaka, kunyangi ya Pasaka.
42 Yesu hanu yahikya emiaka ekumi na ebhiri, bhakagya nawe ku-nyangi, kuring'aana na ekimiira yabho.
43 Ginyangi hanu gyahwa, abhebhuri bhaye bhakahunjuka ika. Hatego weki akatigara Yerusaremu. Abhebhuri bhaye bhatamaanya ego,
44 kwa okubha bhamanyanga ega, arihamwi na bharikyabho bhanu bhahindanga ika hamwi. Hanu rwahwa rusiku rumwi bira kumurora, abhebhuri bhaye bhakamba kumutuna ku bhahiiri bhabho na abhasani bhabho.
45 Hanu ya bhabhura, bhakahunjuka Yerusaremu, naho bhamutune eyo.
46 Orusiku rwa kasatu, bhakamunyoora murubhago rwa erisyengerero rya Waryubha, yekeeri gati ya abhehigirya. Arabhetegerera na arabhabhuurya amang'ana.
47 Abhantu bhonsego bhanu bheegwa kyego yaringa aragamba. Bhakaruguura bhukong'u eguru ya obhumanyi bhwaye, na kyego yakyukyanga.

48 Abhebhuri bhaye, hanu bhamurora, bhakaruguura bhukong'u, "haa!" Ng'inawabho akamubhuurya, "Uuwe mwana wani, kwaki otukoreeri ego? Oni na esewenyu twaringa na obhobha bhukong'u, twaringa turakutuna!"
49 Akakyukya ega, "Kwaki mwaringa murantuna? Nko okugamba mutamanyiri ega, ndenderwa nikare mu-nyumba ya Tata?"
50 Naho erikyukya riyo, abhebhuri bhaye bhatarimanya.
51 Amahairo gayo gajakuhwa, bhakagya nawe ika wabho mu-mugi gwa Nazareti. Akabha arabhegwa, gayo gonsego gaakoreka ng'inawabho akagabhiika mu-nkoro yaye.
52 Yesu akagendererya kukiina, akabha na gitungwa, akabha ang'ariiri Waryubha na abhantu.
Yuda arekirirya okumukorera eniku Yesu
1 Enyangi ya emikate ginu gitakutuurwa-mo obhutunduru yaringa ehikiri hang'i. Enyangi iyo yabhirikirwanga Epasaka.
2 Abhakuru bha abhasyengeri hamwi na abhehigirya bha amaragiriryo, bhaaringa bharatuna enjira ya okwita Yesu. Nawe, bhobhohanga abhantu.
3 Erisambwa rika soherera Yuda unu arabhirikirwa Iskariote, oumwi wa Abhehigira bha Yesu ekumi na bhabhiri yaringaho oumwi wabho unu yabhirikirwanga Yuda Iskariote akasohererwa na erisambwa.
4 Yuda akagya ku- bhakuru bha abhasyengeri, na ku-bhakuru bha abharindi bha enyumba ya Waryubha, akekiriran'ya nabho kyego yakakorere eniku Yesu kubheene.
5 Bhakajomerwa bhukong'u, bhakeekiriran'ya kumuhana egihera.
6 Yuda akeekirirya, akaamba okutuna omweya gwa okubhorokya Yesu, bira abhantu bhaaru kumanya.
Obhusemya bhwa enyangi ya epasaka
7 Orusiku rwa enyangi ya emikate ginu gitakuturwa-mo obhutunduru rukahika, ndo rwaringa orusiku rwa ekimwenso kya ering'ondi.
8 Yesu akatuma Petero hamwi na Yoana, akabhakeerya, "Mugende mutuseemerye ebhyakurya bhya Epasaka, naho tuje turye hamwi."
9 Bhakamubhuurya, "Orenda tusemeeryeha?"
10 Akakyukya, "Hanu mwakasohe mu-mugi gwa Yerusaremu, mwakasikane na musaja umwi agegeri ensengo ya amanji, mu-musete mpaka mu-nyumba munu yakasohe.
11 Mukeerye omwene enyumba uyo ega, omwihigirya arabhuurya, ekyumba kya abhageni kiringiha? Ndenda okurira-mo ebhyakurya bhya Epasaka hamwi na abhehigira bhani.
12 Wonse yakabhorokye ekyumba ekinene mu-nyumba ginu gigegeni, mwakanyore kikorerwe amagodo, museemerye muyo."
13 Bhakagya bhakanyoora gonsego kyego Yesu abhakeererye. Bhakaamba okuseemya ebhyakurya bhya Epasaka.
14 Eribhaga rya okurya hanu ryahika, Yesu akekara kurya ebhyakurya hamwi na abhatumwa ht
bhaye.
15 Akabhakeerya ega, "Bhoono nhanjiri bhukong'u okurya ebhyakurya bhya Epasaka hamwi na bhenyu nkyarikunyorwa na eng'anga!
16 Kwakubha ndabhakeerya ega, ntakyara kweki ebhyakurya bhya Epasaka mpaka gonsego ganu gaseemibhwa ku-bhukama bhwa Waryubha, gakoreke."
17 Akagega ekikombe kya divai, akakumya Waryubha, akagamba, "mugege munywe bhonsego!
18 Kwakubha ndabhakeerya ega, kwambira bhoono, ntakyanywa kweki edivai, mpaka obhukama bhwa Waryubha hanubhuriija."
19 Akamara akagega omkate, akakumya Waryubha, akagubhutura, akabhahana abhatumwa bhaye akabhakeerya, "Gunu ngo omubhiri gwani gunu gurimwenswa kwa ajiri yenyu, mukore ego kwa okunhituka oni!"
20 Egoego hanu bhamara okurya ebhyakurya, akagega ekikombe akagamba, "Ekikombe kinu, nkya emuma enhya inu erihwa kwa okwitika amanyinga gani kwa ajiri yenyu.
21 Nawe mumanye ega! Unu yakankorere eniku, ninawe hamwi kumeja.
22 kwakubha omwana wa Adamu aragya kwitwa kyego bhurya yaringa esemiibhwe. Nawe, hahu omuntu unu aramukorera eniku!"
23 Mbe, abhatumwa bhaye bhakamba kubhuuran'ya abhene kwa abhene, niwi gati yabho arakore eng'ana iyo.
Ginhaka eguru ya obhukuru
24 Gikabhaho eginhaka gati ya abhatumwa bhaye ega, niwi gati yabho ng'o aretegererwa kubha omukuru kukira bharikyaye.

25 Egihaka giyo gikakora Yesu abhakeerye ega, "Abhakama bha bhanu bhatamanyiri Waryubha, bharatunga abhantu bhabho kwa eginguru. Na abhakuru bhabho bhara bhandirirya abhantu bhabho na okwikumya ega, mbhaseren'ya.
26 "Nawe bhenyu mutige kubha ego, naho gati yenyu omuntu araabhe omukuru kukira abhandi, abhe ng'o omuke kubhonsego. Na kyego aratunga, abhe kya omukori wa emirimu.
27 Mbe! Niwi omkuru? Unu arekara kumeja kurya ebhyakurya, kusi unu arareta ebhyakurya? Ndamanya ng'unu arekara kurya ebhyakurya. Nawe oni ndihanu gati yenyu kya omukori wa emirimu.
28 Mbhenyu mbo mwasaga naoni eribhaga ryonsego rya amasakyo gani.
29 Kyego bhurya Tata ya ng'aana Obhukama oni nonse ndabhahaana obhukama ego ego.
30 Naho munyore okurya na okunywa ku-meja yani, na ku-nyangi ya obhukama bhwani na okwikara ku-bhitumbi bhya obhukuu enu murajibhya amakabhira ekumi na gabhiri ga Israeri".
Yesu Ararota ega Petero Arimwanga
31 Yesu akagamba, "Simoni, Simoni! Itegerera. Omanye ega, Erisambwa rikiriribhwe kubhasakya mubhe kya omuntu unu arerura obhuro.
32 Nawe nkusabhiiri ku Waryubha, naho eimani yaho etige kuhigwa. Na hanu orinhindira, osiige bharikyaho."
33 Simoni akamukyukya ega, "Omukama wetu, oni ndingi hamwi nauuwe, na ndatura kugya kubhohwa mwigereja, hata kwitwa hamwi na uuwe!"
34 Yesu akakyukya, "Uuwe Simoni Petero! Ndakukeerya ega, ensarigoko etakaragure rero, okyari kuunyanga mara kasatu ega, otamanyiri."
Ganu Ganyamwa Eguru ya Yesu Garakorwa Bhoono
35 Ebhagarindi Yesu akabhuurya abhehigira bhaye, "hanu nabhatuma bira ensakwa ya egihera wara ensaho na bira bhiratu mwasuhirwa kintu kiyo kyonsego?" Bhakakyukya, "tutasuhirwa".
36 Akabhakeerya, "Nawe kwambira bhoono, omuntu unu yana ensakwa ya egihera, kasi ensaho, agege. Na unu atana empanga agurye ekabhuti yaaye, naho agure empanga imwi.
37 kwakubha ndabhakeerya ega, amang'ana ganu ga amanyamo amarabhu ga Waryubha, yabharwa hamwi na abhasarya, garenderwa gakoreke. Ganu ganyamwa eguru yani, gahikire obhuteero bhwago.
38 Bhonse bhakamukeerya, "Omukama wetu! Rora! Hanu giriho mpanga ebhiri." Wonse akabhakyukya, "Mbhwahene."
Yesu Arasabha Waryubha Mu-nkuku ya Mizeituni
39 Yesu akarwa hayo akagya mu-nkuku ya Mizeituni, kyeego yaringa anariri. Abhehigira bhaye bhakagya nawe.
40 Hanu yahika mu-nkuku akabhakeerya ega, "Muusabhe Waryubha naho mutaaja kusoha mumasakyo".
41 Omwene akeyahura hayo akasuntara embere hake, kama obhutambi bhwa omuntu okurekera rigina. Akegama hansi akasabha Waryubha ega,
42 "Tata! Kama orenda, undusye ku-ng'ana inu. Nawe siyo kyego ndenda oni naho amega gaho gabhe!"
43 Rumwiigo, maraika kurwa murwire akamurwira akamwijurya ginguru.
44 Wonse kwabhurya yaringa na obhururu bhwaru, akagendererye kusabha Waryubha. Ebhigeri bhyaye bhikabha bhiratonya hansi kya amatonyekera ga amanyinga.
45 Hanu yamara kusabha Waryubha akemuka, akabhahindira abhehigira bhaye akanyora bhareri gintiro kwakubha bharinga bhasurumberi.
46 Akabhabhuurya ega, "Ndegwa mureri? Mubhuuke! Musabhe Waryubha mutaaja kusoha mumasakyo."
Yesu Aragwatwa
47 Mbe, hanu yaringa akyagamba gayo, akajirwa na abhantu bhaaru. Na unu yabhirikirwanga Yuda, oumwi wa abhehigira bhaye ekumi na bhabhiri, aringi embere ya abhantu bhayo akamusuntarira akamuhumbhata.
48 Yesu akamubhuurya, "Uuwe Yuda! Oramukorera eniku Omwana wa Adamu kwa kumuhumbhata?"
49 Abhehigira bhaye hanu bhaarora ganu garinga hang'i kukoreka, bhakamubhuurya, "Omukama wetu tiga, tubhageje na egimpanga?"
50 Rumwiigo, oumwi wabho akamutema omukori wa emirimu wa omukuru wa abhasyengeri akamukamung'asura okutwi kwa okuryo.
51 Yesu akagamba tiga eng'ana inu eresa!" Akakun'ya okutwi kwa omuntu uyo, akakuhwen'ya.

52 Nho Yesu akakeerya abhakuru bha abhasyengeri, na abhakuru bha abharindi bha enyumba ya Waryubha, hamwi na abhakaruka bha ekiyahudi. "Bhenyu! Kwaki munseteri na egimpanga na egindungu, muna mwoherye omwibhi wa bhintu?
53 ndegwa kirasiku twagosoryanga hamwi mu-nyumba ya Waryubha, mutangwata! Nawe bhoono, eribhaga ryenyu ndyorinu, erya obhutungi bhwa abhasarya".
54 Rumwiigo, abhantu bhayo bhakamuhurumukira bhaka mugwata, bhakamuhira mpaka ika owa omukuru wa abhasyengeri . Petero akabharwa enyuma kwa hare.
Petero Aranga Yesu
55 Hanu bhahika bhakamba okukoma omururo ku-bhoori, hanu bhamara bhakekara hamwi. Petero woonse akekara mbarika yabho.
56 Omuhara umwi omukori wa emirimu akamurora yekeri ku-bhurabhu bhwa omururo, akamutunurura ameso akagamba, "Omuntu unu, yaringa hamwi nawe.
57 Nawe Petero akanga, "Uuwe! Omukariunu! Oni ntamumanyiri omuntu uyo".
58 Hakego omuntu oundi akarora Petero, akamubhuurya,"Uuwe wonse ng'umwi wabho. "Nawe Petero akakyukya, "Mura uuwe! Oni ntamumanyiri we!"
59 Eribhaga rikahita muna nsa imwi, omuntu oundi akakomererya ega, "maheene, omuntu unu yaringa hamwi nawe! kwakubha wonse mu-gariraya!"
60 Nawe Petero akakyukya, "Mura uuwe! gayo oragambha,oni ntagamanyiri!"
Hanu yaringa akyagamba gayo, ensarigoko ekaragura.
61 Omukama akamwikyukirya, akamumahirira Petero mumeso. Rumwigo, Petero akahituka amang'ana ganu Omukama yaringa amariri kumukeerya ega, rero, ensarigoko etararagura rero, wakanyange mara kasatu."
62 Mbe, Petero akahuruka kibhara, akakuura bhukong'u.
Abharindi Bharamujabhura Yesu
63 Abhantu bhanu bharinga bharamurinda Yesu, bhakabha bharamujabhura. na okumutema.
64 Bhakamukundikirya ameso enu bharamubhuurya, " rengererya! Niwi akutemeri?"
65 Bhakagendererya kumtuka matuki maru.
Yesu Arajongerwa Embere ya Abhakuru
66 Hanu bhwaakya, ekiikaro kya abhakaruka bha ekiyahudi, abhakuru bha abhasyengeri na abhehigirya bha amaragiriryo bhakekuman'ya hamwi. Yesu akaretwa kwibharaja ryabho,
67 bhakamubhuurya, "Kama uuwe! Nuwe Kristo, otukeerye". Yesu akakyukya, "Hata nkabhakeerya, mutekirirye.
68 Na ndabhabhuurye eng'ana, mutaakyukye.
69 Nawe kurwa bhoono, Omwana wa Adamu aribha yekeri rubhaara rwa okuryo rwa Waryubha owa obhuturo.
70 Bhonsego, bhakamubhuurya Yesu kweki, "Nko okugamba uuwe mwana wa Waryubha?" Yesu akakyukya, "Ndegwa abhene mutubhwiri ega, oni ng'o!"
71 Bhakamara bhakagamba"! Mbe! turenda bhusutiki kweki? Twigwiri bhetu abhene kurwa mu-munwa gwaye."
Yesu arajongerwa ku Pirato
1 Ebhagarindi, abhakuru bhonsego bha abhayahudi bhakemirira, bhakamuhira Yesu ku Pirato.

2 Bhakaamba kumujongera kwa bhururu bharagamba ega, "Omuntu unu tumunyoreri arasarya ekyaro kyetu kwa kubha arakan'ya abhantu, bhatatobha erigoti ku Kaisari. Na aragamba ega, weki ng'o Kristo Omukama."
3 Nho Pirato akamubhuurya ega, "Uuwe Mukama wa abhayahudi?"
Yesu woonse akagamba, "Ndegwa uuwe omwene otubhwiri!"
4 Pirato akabhakeerya abhakuru bha abhasyengeri, hamwi na omuganda gwa abhantu. "Omuntu unu atana bhusarya bhuyobhonsego."
5 Nawe abhantu bhayo bhakakomererya ega! "Arasigirirya abhantu kwa obhwihigirya bhwaye ku-kyaro kyonsego kya bhuyahudi yambira Gariraya, na bhoono yahikiri Yudea."
6 Hanu Pirato yeegwa gayo, akabhuurya nyoore Yesu mu-gariraya.
7 Hanu yamanya ega, mu-gariraya wa obhutungi bhwa Herode, akamuhira ku Herode kwakubha ginsiku giyo, Herode yaringa Yerusaremu hayo.
Yesu arahirwa ku Herode.
8 Hanu Herode yamurora, akajomerwa bhukong'u kwakubha yaringa yegwiri amang'ana gaye. Yegombanga kumurora naho omwene arore ebhika bhinu arakora.
9 Herode akamubhuririrya amang'ana maru. Nawe Yesu atakyukya ng'ana.
10 Abhakuru bha abhasyengeri na abhehigirya bha amaragiriryo bhakabha bha okwamba kumujongera.
11 Herode woonse na abhasirikare bhaye bhakamba kumujera, bhakamusekerera, bhakamwibhohya egibho enjomu ya Ekikama, bhakamara bhakamuhindya ku Pirato.
12 Herode na Pirato bharinga bhasigu kwambira hayo bhakabha bhasani.
Pirato ararusya omweya Yesu yetwe.
13 Ebhagarindi Pirato akabhakuman'ya abhakuru bha abhasyengeri, na abhatungi bha abhayahudi, hamwi na abhantu bha mu-mugi.
14 Akagamba, "Mundeteeri omuntu unu muragamba ega, yaringa arahabhya abhantu. Bhoono mwitegerere mwigwe. neekomerye bhwahene okujongera kyenyu kwonsego, bhutariho bhusarya bhwobhwonse bhunu naaruji.
15 Kora Herode wonse ataruji bhusarya bhwobhwonse bhurya, nkyo kikoreri amuhunjukirye kuoni. Mumanye ega, omuntu unu ataakora ng'ana mbibhi inu arekore yetwe!
16 Kwego, ndamutema ebhibhoko, ndamara ndamuhatira."
17 Pirato yaringa arenderwa okuhatira mubhohwa umwi kira hanu enyangi ya Epasaka yahikanga.
18 Nawe abhantu bhayo bhonsego bhakajirira kwa hamwi ega, "mumurusye-ho omuntu uyo, otusikurire Baraba!"
19 Baraba uyo, yaringa abhoherwe mwigereja kwa kubha yaringa akoreri obhusarya mu-mugi, na yaringa yetiri omuntu.
20 Pirato yaringa arenda kuhatira Yesu ego, akagambha nabho kweki.
21 Nawe bheki bhakagendererya kutema ekituri, "mubhambe ku-msarabha! mubhambe ku-msarabha!"
22 Pirato akabhakeerya kweki orwa kasatu! "Akoreri bhubhibhiki? Ndegwa ntakurora bhusarya bhuyo bhonsego ku-mwene bhunu bhurakore yetwe. Kwego ndamutema ebhibhoko mare muhatire."
23 Nawe abhantu bhayo bhakagendererya okutema ekituri bhukong'u ega, Yesu abhambwe kumsarabha. Kubhumaririryo ekituri kyabho kikahiga.
24 Mbe, Pirato akabhahatirirya Abhayahudi bhayo kukora kyeego bharenda.
25 Akabhasikurira Baraba kurwa mwigereja, unu yaringa abhoherwe kwa okukora obhusarya mu-mugi na obhwiti. Akabhahana Yesu naho bhamukore kyego bharenda.
Yesu arabhambwa kumusarabha.

26 Hanu bharinga bharamuhira Yesu okumubhamba ku-musarabha, bhakasikana na omuntu umwi, eriina ryaaye Simoni wa omugi gwa Kurene, ararwa mu-bhijiji. Mbe, bhakamugwata, bhakamwitikya omusarabha gunu Yesu yaringa yetiikiri, akabha aragenda enyuma yaye.
27 Abhantu emiganda na emiganda bhakamuseta Yesu. Gati yabho bharinga-mo abhakari bhanu bhaamukuriranga na okufumba oruku.
28 Yesu akabhekyukirya, akabhakeerya ega, "bhenyu abhahara bha Yerusaremu! Mtigekunkurira oni! mwikurire bhenyu abhene, na mukurire abhaana bhenyu!
29 Mumanye bhujomu ega, eginsiku girija, ginu abhantu bharigamba ega, nyakara abhagumba bhanu bhatakebhwiri na egimbere gyabho gitakanenerye abhana
30 Eribhaga riyo abhantu bharikeerya eginkuku, "mutugwire na ebhikuku mtukundikirirye".
31 Kwa ensonga yega, kama gayo garakoreka ku-muntu unuatasarirye kintu eribha egaki kumusarya?"
32 Abhasikare bhakagega Yesu hamwi na abhasarya bhabhiri, naho bhetwe hamwi.

33 Hanu bhahika ahasi hanu harabhirikirwa Ekihuri kya Omutwe, nho bhakamubhamba ku-musarabha. Bhakabhamba na abhasarya bhabhiri bhayo, umwi rubhaara rwaye rwa okuryo na oundi rubhaara rwaye rwa okumosi.
34 Yesu akagamba, "Tata! Obhabhire! Kwakubha bhatamanyiri kinu bharakora.
Abhasikare bhayo bhaamara bhakagabhana egingibho gyaye kwa okugitemera ekura.
35 Abhantu bhaaringa bhemiriri hayo bharamahirira ganu garakoreka.
Abhakuru bha Abhayahudi bhakamujera bharagamba, "Ndegwa yatuuryanga abhandi! Mbe, bhoono yetuurye omwene, Kama ng'o Kristo amuchwagurwa wa Waryubha.
36 Abhasirikare bhonse bhakamujera, bhakamusuntarira bhakamuhana amarwa amajinjimu.
37 Bhakamukeerya ega, "kama heene uuwe mu-kama wa Abhayahudi, ituurye omwene turore!"
38 Na eguru ya omusarabha gunu yaringa abhambirwe-ko, gakaturwa-ko amanyamo gega, , "Unu ng'o Omukama wa Abhayahudi."
39 Oumwi wa abhasarya a bhabhiri bhanu bhaaringa bhabhambirwe kumusarabha hamwi, akatuka Yesu ega, " Mbhuheene ega, uuwe nuwe Kristo? Mbe! Ituurya omwene! Otuturye na bhetu bhonse!"
40 Nawe omusarya oundi akakan'ya murikyaye akagamba, "uuwe otakobhoha Waryubha? Enu uuwe wonse onyoreri obhujibhu bhuyo bhuyo.
41 Nawe bheetu tujibhiibhwe kwa obhuhene, ganu ngo endihi ya ganu twakora. Nawe omuntu unu, atakora kiyo kyonsego kibhibhi".
42 Hanu yamara kukan'ya murikyaye akagamba, "Yesu, unhituke oni hanu wakasohe ku-bhukama bhwaho".
43 Yesu akakyukya, "Ndakukeerya obhuhene, rero wakabhe hamwi na oni murwire."
Okukwa kwa Yesu
44 Hanu yahika nsa esansabha mubhasu, Eryubha rikasima, ekisunte kikakurya mu-kyaro kyonsego bhukabha obhwira kabhiri mpaka hanu yahika saa kenda.
45 Eshuka inu yaringa eturungajiibhwe mwisyengerero rya Waryubha, ekabharuka mabhaara gabhiri.
46 Yesu akakuura kwa eriisi enene, "Tata! Obhuhoru bhwani ndbhutuura mu-mabhoko gaho". Hanu yamara okugamba gayo, gukawamo.
47 Omukuru wa abhasikare hanu yarora ganu gakorekeri, akamukumya Waryubha akamara akagamba ega, "Mbhuheene ega, omuntu unu yaringa wa heene!"
48 Abhantu bhonsego, bhanu bharinga bhekumen'ye hayo hanu bhaarora amang'ana gayo, bhakahunjuka ika owabho, bhaketetema ku-bhikubha bhyabho kwa okusurumbara.
49 Abhasani bhaye na abhakari bhanu bharinga bharamuseta kurwa Gariraya, bhaaringa bhemiriri hare bharamahirira ganu garakoreka.
Yesu arabhiikwa.
50 Yaringa-ho omuntu umwi, eriina ryaaye Yusufu, ku-kijiji kimwi kya abhayahudi kinu kirabhirikirwa Arimataya.
51 Yaringa muntu wa heene, na yaganyiriranga obhukama bhwa Waryubha bhuje. Hata kama yaringa umwi wa eribharaja erikuru rya abhayahudi, atekiriran'ya na bharikyaye ku-ng'ana iyo ya okwita Yesu.
52 Mbe, akagya ku Pirato akasabha ahanwe omubhiri gwa Yesu.
53 Akagwikya kurwa ku-musarabha, akagukundikirya ensanda. akagutura mu-mbihira inu yaringa ebhajirwe kwitare, inu yaringa ekyari kuturwa-mo omuku oundi.
54 Orusiku ruyo ryaringa ijumaa na ndwo rwaringa orusiku rwa okuseemya kwa esabato, na esabato yaringa yambhiri.
55 Na abhakari bhanu bhaaja hamwi na Yesu kurwa Gariraya, bhakaseeta Yusufu. bhakamaha embihira na kyego omubhiri gwa Yesu guterwe-mo.
56 Bhakamara bhakahunjuka ika, bhakaseemya amaguta na obhurange naho kuhaka omubhiri gwa Yesu. Bhakamuunya orusiku rwa esabato kyego yaringa eragiriribhwe.
Okuhyuka kwa Yesu
1 Orusiku rwa okwamba rwa obhoyo nyenkyo juri, abhakari bhayo bhakagega ubhurange bhunu bhaaringa bhaseemerye bhakagya ku-mbihira.
2 Hanu bhahika bhakanyoora erigina rinu ryaringarikundikirye embihira rihiringitiibhwe kurwa ku-mbihira .
3 bhakasoha munsi, nawe bhatagurora omubhiri gwa Omukama Yesu.
4 Hanu bharinga bhakyarugura eguru ya eng'ana iyo, rumwiigo abhantu bhabhiri, bhanu bharinga bhebhoheri egigibho ginu girang'esang'esa ndabhu pee, bhakemirira hang'i nabho.
5 Abhakari bhayo bhakagwatwaa na enkubhi, bhakhiin'ya obhusu bhwabho hansi.
Nho abhantu bhayo bhakabhakeerya ega, "Kwaki muratuna omuhoru gati ya abhaku?
6 Atarihanu ahyukiri! Muhituke ganu yabhakeerya hanu mwaringa Gariraya
7 ega, yenderwanga omwana wa Adamu atuurwe mu-mabhoko ga abhasarya, abhambwe kumusarabha na orusiku rwa kasatu ahyuke!"
8 Nho abhakari bhayo bhakagahituka amang'ana ga Yesu.
9 Kwa ego bhakahinda kurwa mu-mbihira, bhakararika amang'ana gayo gonsego ku-bhatumwa bha Yesu ekumi na umwi, hamwi na abhandi bhonsego.
10 Bhanu bhaagamba amang'ana gayo ku-bhatumwa bha Yesu, mbha Mariamu Magidarena, Yoana na Mariamu ng'ina wabho Yakobo, hamwi na abhakari abhandi bhanu bharinga hamwi nabho.
11 Nawe abhatumwa bha Yesu hanu bhegwa amang'ana gayo, bhakabhehya abhakari bhakamaha ega ninjabhuro.
12 Nawe Petero akemuka, akakenya kugya ku-mbihira. Hanu yehiinya kusomererya munsi, akarora ensanda eyene inu Yesu yaringa akundikiribhwe, akahinda ika enu araruguura eguru ya gayo gatukiri.
Yesu ku njira kugya Emau

13 Orusiku ruyo ruyo rwa obhoyo, abhehigira bhabhiri abha Yesu bharinga ku- rugendo rwa kugya mu-kijiji kya Emau. Ekijiji kiyo kyaringa kama kiromita ekumi na imwi kurwa Yerusaremu, nkya kurwa bhukabwa kugya mukiringo.
14 Bhagendanga bharahairira eguru ya amang'ana ganu gaatukiri.
15 Hanu bharinga bhakyahaira na okubhuran'ya, Yesu omwene akabhajira akagenda hamwi nabho.
16 Nawe ameso gabho gakabha na amarimoni, bhakamurora naho bhatamanya ega ng'o.
17 Akabhabhuurya, "Murahairiraki enu muragenda kunjira?" Bhakemirira bhukiri, obhusu bhwabho bhukorokya okusurumbara.
18 Oumwi wabho eriina ryaaye Kireopa akakyukya, "Uuwe omwene nuuwe omugeni Yerusaremu hanu, unu otamanyiri ganu gatukiri nsiku ginu?"

19 Woonse akabhabhuurya, "mang'anaki gayo?" Bhakakyukya, "Bhetu turahairira amang'ana ganu gaakoreka eguru ya Yesu wa Nazareti. Weki yaringa muroti owa obhuturo bhwa okukora na okwihigirya embere ya Waryubha na abhantu bhonsego.
20 Abhakuru bha abhasyengeri na abhatungi bhwetu bhakamujibhya kukwa, bhaka mubhamba ku-musarabha.
21 Nawe bhetu twesiganga ega, weki ng'o akaturirye Israeri. Na kurwa amang'ana gayo gakoreke, rero ndusiku rwa kasatu.
22 Kweki abhakari bha mu-muganda gwetu, bhanu bhaagya ku-mbihira nyenkyo juri bhatutakirye ega,
23 bhatanyoora omubhiri gwaye mu-mbihira na ega, bhakarwirwa na maraika. maraika uyo akabhakeerya ega, Yesu m- muhoru.
24 "Hanu bhamariri kutukeerya ego, bharikyetu bhaagya ku-mbihira, bhaanyora gonsego kyego abhakari bhayo bhatukererye. Nawe Yesu omwene bhatamuruji."
25 Yesu akabhakeerya!"Bhenyu mwakangiha!, muna emioyo emikong'u gya okwanga okwikirirya amang'ana ganu gagambwa na abharooti!.
26 Kusi etenderwanga Kristo kuhitira enyanko iyo, na kusoha mu-bhurabhu bhwaye?"
27 Nho, Yesu akabhatubhurira amang'ana gonsego ganu ganyamwa eguru yaye, kwambira ebhitabho bhya Musa, na ebhitabho bhya abharooti bhonsego.
28 Bharinga bharihang'i kuhika mu-kijji kinu bhagyanga-mo, Yesu akekorya muna arahitiran'ya.
29 Nawe, bhakamwisasama bhukong'u, bhakamukeerya, "Wikare hamwi nabhetu hanu! Kwakubha bhoonwego mgorobha na ekisunte kirenda kuja. Nho, Yesu akasoha mu-nyumba kugosorya nabho.
30 Na hanu bhekara hamwi ku-meja okurya ebhyakurya, Yesu akagega omukate, akagunonka, akakumya Waryubha, akabhahana.
31 Rumwigo ameso gabho gakarimbururwa na bhakamumanya, hayohayo akabhabhurako.
32 Mbe, bhakabhuuran'ya, "kwaki tutamumanyiri hanu yari arahaira nabhetu ku-njira, aratorokya Amanyamo Amarabhu ga Waryubha?
33 Ebhaga riyoriyo bhakemuka bhakahunjuka Yerusaremu. Bhakanyora abhehigira ekumi na umwi na abhandi bhanu bhaaringa bhekumen'ye hamwi ,
34 bharagamba ega, "Mbhuhene Omukama wetu ahyukiri! amurwiriri Simoni!'
35 Nho abhehigira abhabhiri bhayo bhakabhakeerya abharikyabho ganu gabharwira ku-njira na kyego bhamanya Yesu kubhubhuni bhwa omkate.
Yesu arabharwira abhehigira bhaye
36 Eribhaga bharinga bhakya hairira amang'ana gayo rumwigo, Yesu omwene akemirira gati yabho akabhakeerya, "omurembe gubhe ku-bhenyu!"
37 Bhaketakya na bhakobhoha bhukong'u kwa kubha bhamanyanga ega bharuji ekihwi.
38 Nawe, Yesu akabhabhuurya, "Ndegwa muna enkubhi mu-mioyo gyenyu?
39 Mumahe amabhoko gani na amaguru gani nho mumanye ega noni omwene! Mu-mbhabhate! Murore kwa kubha ekihwi kitana minoku na maguha kyego murandora oni kubha nagyo."
40 Hanu Yesu yamara kubhakeerya gayo, akabhorokya amabhoko na amaguru gaye.
41 Mbe, abhehigira bhaye bhatekirirya obhuheene bhuyo kwakubha bhajomerwa bhukong'u na bharinga bhararuguura. Nho Yesu akabhabhuurya, " muna ebhyakurya bhyobhonse hanu?"
42 Bhakamuhana orubhaara rwa enswi inu ekarirwe,
43 akagega akarya embere yabho.

44 Hanu yamara akabhakeerya, "Ganu, ngo nabhakeeryanga hanu naringa hamwi nabhenyu, ega gonsego ganu ganyamwa eguru yani garenderwa gakoreke, ganu garingi ku-maragiriryo ga Musa na kubhitabho bhya abharooti na ebhitabho bhya kugi Zaburi.'
45 Nho akabhasikurira obhung'eni bhwabho naho bhamanye amanyamo amarabhu ga Waryubha.
46 Kweki akabhakeerya, "Yanyamwa ega, Kristo ariitwa, na orusiku rwa kasatu, arihyuka kurwa mu-bhaku.
47 Na abhantu bha amakabhira gonsego, kwambira Yerusaremu, bharihigiribhwa kwa eriina ryaye okwikirirya obhusarya bhwabho naho bhabhirwe.
48 Na bhenyu mbho ambasuti bha amang'ana gayo.
49 "Bhoono ndabharetera Omutima omurabhu gwa Waryubha kyego bhurya Tata yaringa abharagiri. Nawe mwikare mu-mugi gunu Yerusaremu, mpaka muhanwe obhuturo kurwa muwrire."
Yesu aremukibhwa kugya murwire
50 Akamara akabhabhahira mpaka mu-mugi gwa Betania, hanubhahika akenura amabhoko gaye eguru akabhanonka.
51 Na hanu yaringa akyabhanonka, akabhatiga akemukibhwa kugya murwire .
52 Bhakamusyengera bhakamara bhakahunjuka Yerusaremu bhajomerwe bhukong'u.
53 Mbe, bhakabha bharekara mu-nyumba ya Waryubha bharamukumya.
